title: Train the trainer : Digital Storytelling project
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
abstract: Ten stories from ACMI's Train the Trainer : Digital Storytelling workshop.
description: Ten stories from the general public that were compiled and produced as part of the Digital Storytelling 'Train the Trainer' program at ACMI. The stories are mostly biographical, usually centred around an memorable or life-changing event, or dedicated to someone the participants find inspirational.
